dcat.NAME: Daily Classes Activity Tracker <sup>DCAT</sup>
dcat.DESC: A desktop app built in JavaFX using Scene Builder, IntelliJ, and Xampp to facilitate tracking daily classes activities like Attendance, Homework level, Exams and its Attendance and Marks. And also keep an eye on income and outcome money then calculate Net Profit monthly, yearly, or even periodically. It can also track and manage reservations at the start of the year. It's a multi-user app with an Admin dashboard to manage users.

ITEMS.caption: Initializing and configuring Database for first time use
Login form provided with teacher's data and contact
Dashboard [Main screen] containing simple statistics, brief App description, teacher's data and contact, currently logged user, copyrights, and finally local date-time
Net Profit screen provided with total of income and outcome and BarChart to visualize and simplify the number language

wifi.NAME: Wi-Fi Passwords
wifi._DESC:
Simple App to find passwords of your known WiFi networks that you connected to before in only 2 mouse clicks, instead of the other complex ways. And there's a button to copy the password directly.
private void refresh() {

    if (osName.startsWith("Windows"))
        refreshInWindows();

    else if (osName.equals("Linux"))
        refreshInLinux();

    fillNetworks(listOfNetworks);

}
This method refresh the Wi-Fi networks then update the list.
